mapper.select: SELECT C.CR_NO, C.CR_TITLE, CH.CHAT_NO, CH.CHAT_DATE FROM CHATROOM C JOIN CHAT CH ON C.CR_NO = CH.CR_NO WHERE C.CR_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{crcmTitle} || '%' ORDER BY CH.CHAT_DATE DESC
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE emp_No <> #{empNO} ORDER BY EMP_NAME
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{empName} || '%' ORDER BY EMP_NAME

SELECT CR_NO FROM ( SELECT CH.CR_NO, MAX(TO_CHAR(CH.CHAT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AS LATEST_CHAT_DATE FROM CHAT CH WHERE CH.CR_NO IN ( SELECT CR_NO FROM CHATMEMBER WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) GROUP BY CH.CR_NO ORDER BY MAX(CH.CHAT_DATE) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
